document_data.name: ''The Secrets of the Obarskyrs''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Secrets of the Obarskyrs''''' was a [[Chapbook]] owned by the [[tiefling]] [[bounty hunter]] [[Havilar]].
document_data.Description: Havilar's boyfriend, [[Aubrin Crownsilver]], was the son of an [[Obarskyr]] bastard. She enjoyed reading about Aubrin's "crazy entertaining" family.
